headline: Show HN: WebDefense – Block malicious websites using AI/ML-based detection
description:
We have developed a web security browser extension i.e. WebDefense to block harmful or malicious websites that users might access by clicking links in email, social media/messaging applications or entering manually on browsers. Unlike existing products, it leverages "cloud-native" AI/ML-based detection methodology to quickly analyze any website in real-time and provide a response within a few seconds.

Here's a quick demo on how it works: https://youtu.be/a6tvjq3Fz10

Please try it out and provide feedback. You can use the credentials below:-

Username: finlocktest@yopmail.com Password: Testing@1234
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: WebDefense - 使用基于AI/ML的检测阻止恶意网站
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: WebDefense - 使用基於AI/ML的檢測阻止惡意網站
